participant_2.background:
I get to be myself when I play with my dogs and make pottery.
i am the oldest sibling.
I collect music and other things that represent my personality and interests.
I'd be scared to tell my family, but I think they'd be accepting.
I was sad when my cat died last year.

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to play with my dogs and make pottery. What about you?
I like to go for walks in the park and think about the lyrics of my favorite rock songs.
That sounds peaceful. I wish I could be more calm, but I'm always getting into trouble.
What do you get into trouble for?
I'm not sure how to explain it, but I just like to have fun. I'm the oldest sibling, so I feel like I have to be the leader and make sure everyone is having a good time.
I think that's great. I'm the oldest in my family too, and I always feel like I have to take care of everyone.
Yeah, but it can be hard sometimes. I always feel like I have to be the responsible one, and I don't always want to be.
Me too. But I think it's important to take some time for yourself too.
Yeah, you're right. I should try to do that more often.
I'm glad we could talk. It's always nice to meet someone who understands what it's like to be the oldest sibling
